name: Bulgarian Society for Rail Transport
goal:
The designation of this Private Research Organization for Advanced Transportation Technologies,
Renewable Energy and Global Ecology is to work for:
- Project: "Bulgarian Contribution to the Chinese Concept One Belt - One Road ";
-Project: "Creation of a new international political-economic organization "Euro-Asian Council for Transport, Energy and Environmental Cooperation";
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Creation of new Intercontinental multifinctional transportation network;
Creation of new hi-speed & super hi-speed intercontinental cargo train;
Creation of new hi-speed & super hi-speed intercontinental passenger train;
Cogeneration of renewable energy;
